ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research was supported by National Key Research and Development Program of China for financial supports (2016YFD0200500). We are grateful to Professor Hanwen Ni of China Agricultural University providing assistance in revising the first draft. We thank Beijing Majorbio Sanger Bio-pharm Technology Co., Ltd for identifying the pathogen using PCR. We also thank American Journal Experts (AJE) for English language editing.
